message: Let's split it 50/50, a fair start!
Take a slightly smaller share, let's move on!
You're getting greedy, Bob! I'll give you a slightly better deal this time.
You're getting closer to the minimum, Alice! Don't make it worse for yourself!
You're getting desperate, Bob! I'm not going to give you the whole pie!
You're really lowballing me now, Alice. Time to make a serious move!
You're really trying to squeeze me, Bob! But I'm not going down without a fight!
This is my last generous offer, Alice. Take it or leave it!
You're really going all-in, Bob! I'll take a chance and try to get a better deal.
You're really pushing your luck, Alice. This is my final offer, take it or leave it!
You're really trying to squeeze me dry, Bob! I'll take a chance and try to get a better deal.
I'll take the last crumbs, Alice. It's time to end this!
